topic.title: x86 and x86-64 Guest Operating Systems

body.p: Oracle Premier Support covers the running of the following guest OSs in a VM with an x86 or x86-64 platform architecture, as appropriate.

ul.li:
Oracle Linux 9 (64-bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 (64-bit)
CentOS Stream 9 (64-bit)

Oracle Linux 8 (64-bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 (64-bit)

Oracle Linux 7 (64-bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 (64-bit)
